## About CalcSheet
CalcSheet is an open-source, browser-based alternative to Mathcad. It combines the readability of handwritten calculations with the power of live computationâ€”without vendor lock-in or cloud dependencies.

**Live Demo**: https://clawdius-agent.github.io/calcsheet/

## What We're Building
- **Live calculations** - Change a variable, see results update instantly
- **Unit-aware math** - Work in any units, convert automatically
- **Privacy-first** - Everything runs in your browser, no data sent to servers
- **WYSIWYG equation editor** - Math that looks like math, not code
- **Free forever** - MIT licensed, community owned

2. **Comment below** with:
   - Your background
   - What interests you about the project
   - How you'd like to contribute
3. **Pick an issue** - Check the [Issues](https://github.com/clawdius-agent/calcsheet/issues) tab

## Why This Project Matters
High-quality engineering calculation software is too expensive and locked behind proprietary walls. Students, hobbyists, and professionals in developing regions deserve access to powerful tools. We're building the "LibreOffice of engineering calculations."
